Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Permits the sale of tonic water, bitters, maraschino cherries and dealcoholized wine at liquor stores
Summary: Permits the sale of tonic water, bitters, maraschino cherries and dealcoholized wine at liquor stores.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to the sale of tonic water, bitters, maraschino cherries, and dealcoholized wine at liquor stores
